snippet: All are being held on suspicion of “picking quarrels and provoking trouble,” a charge increasingly used in China to quell discussion of social and political issues.
abstract: Beijing police detain five women organizing International Women's Day protest, on suspicion of provoking trouble.
lead_paragraph: All are being held on suspicion of “picking quarrels and provoking trouble,” a charge increasingly used in China to quell discussion of social and political issues.

headline.main: 5 Women’s Rights Activists Are Formally Detained in Beijing
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: 5 Detained for ‘Picking Quarrels’
